content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Hello Ryanah, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm glad you're interested in renting my apartment. The monthly rental price for this 25 square meter apartment is 750 Euros. However, I am open to negotiating and would be willing to discuss a lower price if you're looking for a more affordable option. What do you think?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I agree to the price of 750 Euros per month. I want to rent the apartment. Thank you for your offer.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Great to hear that! I'm glad you found the rental price acceptable. To clarify, the apartment is located in a prime location and comes with all modern amenities. It's perfect for someone who wants to live in a comfortable and convenient environment. The apartment is also fully furnished, so you won't have to worry about purchasing any additional items. Is there anything else I can assist you with?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
No, that's all. Thank you for your help. I will sign the contract as soon as possible.
TERMINATE
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for choosing to rent my apartment, Ryanah. I'm glad you found it to your liking. If you have any questions or concerns during the signing process, please don't hesitate to reach out to me. I'm looking forward to having you as my tenant.
name: Heinrich Heine
